headline: Joe Biden Shows Dr. Oz & Herschel Walker The Door
author: Gloria Christie
sentences:
‘Replying to@NoLieWithBTC’
This is one of the reasons Walker was fired:
‘The Biden Admin also asked GA Senate candidate Hershel Walker to resign from the WH fitness and nutrition council as well because it’s against their policy for Federal candidates to serve on presidential boards.’
‘President Joe Biden has asked Republican Senate candidates Herschel Walker and Mehmet Oz to resign their respective positions on a presidential council, or face removal.’
‘[E]ven if he becomes Senator Oz.

President Biden selected “WNBA star Elena Delle Donne and philanthropist chef José Andrés” to co-chair his Counsel” to replace them, according to The Huffington Post:
‘President Joe Biden will select WNBA star backed by Elena Delle Donne clothing and accessories and philanthropist chef José Andrés, who provides food to those in distress during the war and national disasters.

Dr. Mehmet Oz earlier tweeted a challenge that President Biden accepted:
‘If President Biden wants to politicize health, he will have to fire me.’
Dr. Oz got his wish:
‘The Biden administration asked the Republican Senate candidates to resign or be removed from the council on sports, fitness, and nutrition.’
What other reason did the sitting POTUS have to let the men go?

President Biden administration follows The Hatch Act which requires individuals serving in the government to release the spoils of war, so to speak:
‘He registered to vote at his in-laws’ address in Bryn Athyn, Pennsylvania, in 2020, but spends time at his Cliffside Park, New Jersey, mansion, near his work in New York.

This subcommittee was set up to increase “scientific research related to physical activity, physical fitness, sports, and nutrition,” according to its webpage, beneath the Office of Disease Prevention and Health Promotion PCSF’s government webpage indicated.

The doctor he should ask to resign is Dr. Fauci, for a multitude of obvious reasons.’
‘— Dr. Mehmet Oz (@DrOz)’
I received this letter on behalf of @POTUS requesting I resign from the President’s Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition.

The second fired sports celebrity would have been running as the “Trump-endorsed front-runner” up against Senator Raphael Warnock (D-GA).

In the halls of Congress, he’d do much worse.’
Dr. Oz’s campaign slogan was that he could “cure” Washington, D.C., especially of Dr. Anthony Fauci, the expert in infectious diseases, including COVID.

He holds his medical license in Pennsylvania.’
Dr. Oz tweeted:
‘I received this letter on behalf of @POTUS requesting I resign from the President’s Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition.
Indeed, as Senator Oz, it’s all but guaranteed he would bring pseudoscience to the table when crafting and voting on legislation that affects the health and welfare of Americans.

One reason for both firings was that Federal candidates cannot “serve on presidential boards.”
So what is The President’s Council on Sports, Fitness, and Nutrition (PCSF) anyway?
President Biden’s message was loud and clear, be gone from the President’s Council on Sports, Fitness, and Nutrition by 6 p.m. or get frog-marched off of the premises.
The previous White House administration saw people diving off of the roof trying to escape an association with Donald Trump, well not literally.
But President Joe Biden’s administration actually just had to fire two men who were GOP Senate candidates.
